Class Ticket

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ticket
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Adult, Child, Employee, MoviePass

    public abstract class Ticket
extends java.lang.Object
    This program demonstrates the abstract Ticket superclass. This class represents a ticket class and contains attributes that are necessary to describe a movie and the movie patron, methods that are necessary to set and get the aforementioned attributes, as well as three abstract methods that must be implemented by subclasses that extend the Ticket class.
    Author:
    hudson

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ticket

        public Ticket(java.lang.String movieName,
              java.lang.String rating,
              int date,
              int time,
              java.lang.String f)
        This constructor accepts a movieName, rating, date, time, and feature as parameters and assigns the parameter variables to the corresponding attributes. It also determines the enumerated format based on the string feature variable.
        Parameters:
        movieName - The name of the movie.
        rating - The rating of the movie.
        date - The date the movie was seen.
        time - The time the movie was seen.
        f - The feature of the movie.
